about_the_game:
Don't forget to follow us and add to your wishlist!


Genius Phantom Thief (self-proclaimed)

With abysmal abilities, failure follows every theft attempt,
So poor, surviving on nothing but toast,
Dreaming of a day with jam to spread.
Lacks the subtlety of a true thief,
Opting for grandeur, craving fame,
Can swindle with ease using treasures and the like.

＊＊Game Description＊＊

Mysterious thief Lucy is about to embark on a sensational theft.
You are a highly skilled lone wolf hacker.
What kind of assistance can you provide to Lucy?
And what benefits can you gain?

＊＊Game Features＊＊

  • Exquisite hand-drawn and animated CG scenes
  • Engage in various ambiguous interactions with Lucy
  • Experience intricate theft plots and various puzzles
  • Assist Lucy in completing missions, opening her heart, and deepening your relationship

＊＊Game Contents＊＊

  • Text arrangement puzzle
  • Pipe connection puzzle
  • Quick Time Events (QTE)
  • Analyzing and collecting information to make correct decisions
  • Using voice oscillograph to mimic others' voices

content_descriptors.notes:
Character is over the age of 20.
Content Warning: "Shadow Code: Lucy" content includes images and descriptions of sexual organs, sexual intercourse, etc.
